welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.subtitle: Existing Marketplace users can now enjoy our mobile experience. Enter your registered email address below to gain access.

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address

errors.sendEmailFailed: Failed to send authentication email. Please try again.
errors.emailNotAuthorized: This email address is not authorized to access the application. Please contact your administrator.
errors.invalidEmail: This email address is not recognized in our system.
errors.networkError: Network connection error. Please check your internet connection and try again.
errors.auth0Error: Authentication service error. Please try again later.
errors.unknownError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
errors.tokenExpiringSoon: Token is expiring soon, refreshing immediately
errors.getAccessTokenError: Failed to refresh token for API call
